posts.post_content:
Hello!

I have a group of ten T206 cards for sale:

1.) Jack Pfeister (throwing) ... American Beauty 350 (no decorative frame) ...
this one is raw, and has creasing in the shape of a "t". The back still presents well in my opinion... ON HOLD

2.) Bill Carrigan ... Sweet Cap 350 f.30 ... PSA 5 ... SOLD

3.) Ed Reulbach (glove shows) ... Piedmont 150 ... PSA 3... ON HOLD

4.) Chief Meyers (fielding) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 3 ... ON HOLD

5.)Doc White (portrait) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 4... ON HOLD

6.) Johnny Evers (portrait) ... Piedmont 150 ... PSA 2... ON HOLD

7.) Johnny Evers (Cubs on shirt/blue sky) ... Piedmont 150 ... SGC 30 2

8.) Mordecai Brown (Cubs on shirt) ... Sweet Cap 150 f.30 ... SGC 40 3 ... ON HOLD

9.) Rube Marquard (portrait) ... Piedmont 350 ... SGC 50 4 ... SOLD

10.) Shag Shaughnessy ... Old Mill ... SGC 40 3

The group has solid eye appeal. My preferred method of payment is Paypal Gift, so we do not have to incur any fees. If you prefer to pay via regular Paypal, that is fine as well, but it will be your responsibility to cover any fees.

Thank you very much.

Derek

Hi All.

I have received a few PM's asking if I will sell pieces individually.

Yes, I will sell pieces individually, and will consider trades for other T206.

My preference is to move the group in one fell swoop, but I am willing to work with you.

Thank You.

Derek

I hope to have scans by tomorrow. Thank you for your patience, and I apologize for the delay.

Derek

I finally got a scanner today. A very big thanks to Mr. Chris Browne for his tips on scanning.... You are the Man Sir!

I apologize for the delay, I know I said I would have these sooner, but I have been a bit tied up. Thank you for your patience.

You may refer to the posts above for more details, or shoot me a PM if you want to discuss.

Thank You!

Derek

Marquard and Carrigan are sold.

Thank you very much.

Derek

The group is pretty much spoken for at this point. I will probably just hang onto the two remaining pieces.

I wanted to thank everyone that took the time with me to discuss potential deals.

Thanks!

Derek
